name: Elbowroom
body:
### ~Prologue~
Elbowroom. There isn't much space to party. But a monkey can try.
Run, jump and fall towards victory in an epic race of small proportions.
Where you begin? You begin in a room, surrounded by THINGS (stay calm)! Your friend will be there, and he probably wants to race you. Amongst the clutter, you see a door. Where does this door lead you don't know, but you and your friend are getting inpatient. You approach this door. Wabaaam, zip zap swing, you are in a whole different world. You are in an Elbowroom. 

![Screenshot 1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6894374/10335577/0dc654dc-6cf2-11e5-98ca-241b5ea706c1.png)
### Game Description
A 3D trap-based, platformer racing game. Race your avatar against a friend through a series of Elbowrooms. Experience the smooth game-play and other exiting stuff wooooooooooooo hhhahahahahahahaha
![Screenshot 2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6894374/10335578/0dca4614-6cf2-11e5-917e-18c3bfd8754e.png)
### What to expect from Elbworoom
* epic times
* races
* jumping
* running
* laughing
* crying
* boosting
* great heights
* no pausing
* no stopping
* no fear
* sudden loss of composure
* death / life? meaning?
* game play

![Screenshot 3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6894374/10335576/0dc6469a-6cf2-11e5-9f9e-ccd3d26336ae.png)

### Game Features
* competitive play - race against a friend!
* multiple race rooms - experience our diverse yet consistently structured set of race rooms.
* speed boosting - boost your running speed to out pace your opponent
* randomly generated race tracks - one of our races is generated on the fly as players navigate from platform to platform. Youll only know where to go next once your there!
* checkpoints - this is a race to the end, your avatar cannot die for good, but will instead respawn at the most recently passed checkpoint when killed.
* rotating platforms - watch the colour of the platforms, if they turn red they are about to flip!
* traps - maneuver your avatar over,around or through the series of traps placed throughout the races.

### How to play:
You begin in the Homeroom, choose the racetrack you wish to enter by walking through its door, this will transport you into the chosen Elbowroom.
Once in an Elbowroom (race track), touch the white start line which will start the countdown to begin the race. Once the race has begun, do your best to out maneuver your opponent, dodge the traps, and avoid falling off platforms to be first to reach the back door of the Elbowroom, the end of the race!

### Authors and Contributors
* Game designed by Jacob Goldberg, Joel Berman Kyle Jacobs
* Animated by Carl Yasudas
* Sound by Jethro Bradford
